channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-15025] Ensure singleton for ResourceEstimatorService
item.description: HADOOP-15013 fixed static findbugs warnings but this has lead to the singleton being broken for ResourceEstimatorService. This jira tracks the fix for the same.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Trivial fix to change the import to Jersey Singleton annotation. I have manually tested it and works fine

-1 overall
